G

Game - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame
Main class backbone of the game, contains the game loop
Game() - Constructor for class com.koucha.experimentalgame.Game
 
GameObject - Interface in com.koucha.experimentalgame
GameObjects can be added to a GameObjectList and will then be processed once per iteration of the game loop
GameObjectList - Class in com.koucha.experimentalgame
List containing GameObject objects
